title: Matt Scottoline from Hurry & Everyone, Everywhere
itunes:title: Matt Scottoline from Hurry & Everyone, Everywhere
description:
Hurry! Download this rad chat I had with Matt Scottoline from Hurry & Everyone, Everywhere (see what I did there? We discuss the ever popular topic of art vs commerce, unconventional ideas and the Philly music scene at large. His bands are awesome and we had a very fun discussion! Get 15% off by using the code PC100WORDSORLESS. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! Use the code WORDS to get $20 off your next concert/sporting event with SeatGeek. I LOVE THEM SO MUCH. Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
